name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Robert TAYLOR, Appellant

judges: Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX, MANDERINO and PACKEL, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Robert TAYLOR, Appellant.
attorneys: F. Emmett Fitzpatrick, Dist. Atty., Steven H. Goldblatt, Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
378 A.2d 858
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Robert TAYLOR, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Oct. 11, 1976.
Decided Oct. 7, 1977.
Patrick Artur, Philadelphia, for appellant.
F. Emmett Fitzpatrick, Dist. Atty., Steven H. Goldblatt, Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX, MANDERINO and PACKEL, JJ.
